dimensions: A. Warp: 86 cm (34 in.). Weft: 92 cm (36 1/4). Both selvedges present. B. Warp: 63 cm (24 3/4 in.). Weft: 91.5 cm (36 in.). Both selvedges present. Pattern: height of repeat not present. Textile designed so that when selvedge to selvedge widths are sewn together properly, design forms a half-drop repeat.
title: Fables of Fontaine
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
description: Two scenes illustrating the fable about wolf and the stork separated by an elaborate curve decorated with flowers. In red on white.
name: Textile
